title: 91/367/EEC: Council Decision of 26 June 1991 on the conclusion of the Wheat Trade Convention, 1986, and the Food Aid Convention, 1986, constituting the International Wheat Agreement, 1986, as extended until 30 June 1993
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 26 June 1991  on the conclusion of the Wheat Trade Convention, 1986, and the Food Aid Convention, 1986, constituting the International Wheat Agreement, 1986, as extended until 30 June 1993  (91/367/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The European Economic Community hereby approves the Wheat Trade Convention, 1986, and the Food Aid Convention, 1986, constituting the International Wheat Agreement, 1986.
The text of the conventions is attached to Decision 86/304/EEC.
The European Economic Community and its Member States, on completion of the necessary internal procedures, shall simultaneously notify the Secretary-General of the United Nations Organization of their acceptance of the International Wheat Agreement,  1986, as extended until 30 June 1993.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to deposit the instrument of approval on behalf of the Community.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 26 June 1991. For the Council
The President
R. STEICHEN
